name: @acrolinx/sidebar-startpage
description: A Container Component for Acrolinx Integrations that loads the Acrolinx sidebar

scripts.dev: npm run prepareDev && concurrently --kill-others -r 'npm run lessWatch' 'npm run tscWatch' 'npm run watchify' 'npm run browsersync'
scripts.test: npm run testNodeJS && npm run testKarmaPhantomJS
scripts.clean: rm -rf tmp && rm -rf app/scripts && rm -rf dist
scripts.buildDist: rm -rf tmp/dist && mkdir -p app/scripts && npm run generateTranslationsTs && npm run tslint && tsc && npm run injectVersion && npm run test && npm run browserify && npm run less && mkdir -p tmp && cp -r app tmp/dist && hashcat tmp/dist/index.html && npm run buildOfflineDist && npm run buildInlined && npm run buildNpmDist
scripts.buildNpmDist: mkdir -p dist && cp -R tmp/dist-offline/ dist && npm run createNpmDistFilesIndex && npm run copyInlinedToNpmDist
scripts.copyInlinedToNpmDist: cp tmp/acrolinx-sidebar-startpage-inlined.js dist/index.js && cp tools/dist/index.d.ts dist/
scripts.buildOfflineDist: rm -rf tmp/dist-offline && cp -r app tmp/dist-offline && npm run inlineSvg ./tmp/dist-offline/styles
scripts.buildInlined: rm -rf tmp/dist-inlined && cp -r app tmp/dist-inlined && hashcat tmp/dist-inlined/index.html && npm run inline && npm run packInlined
scripts.inline: npm run inlineSvg ./tmp/dist-inlined/styles && cd tmp/dist-inlined && cat index.html |inliner >../dist-inlined.html

author: Acrolinx

// devDependencies comments.sinon: Newer versions (6.1.3) caused problems in test build for IE11
// devDependencies comments.preact: This is the only package that is build into the final startpage code.
